title: Can't get out of bronze as adc
body: I just can't get out of bronze as adc if you check I lost 4 game in a row where the scores are just crazy and didn't feel like bronze. I shot call get decent cs most games, I win lane and if I don't win lane I almost always come back into the game some how. Is it just extremely hard to carry from adc role? I know I can carry myself out from any other role except support as I have done it before in preeason and this season but I can't seem to manage it as an adc.
